UCL: Qarabag v Ajax
programme.desc: Azerbaijani champions Qarabag look to get back to winning ways in the league phase as they host an Ajax side who are rooted to the bottom of the table, without a point.

programme.title: UCL: Villarreal v Copenhagen
programme.desc: Marcelino Garcia Toral's Villarreal seek their first win of the league phase as they take on Danish champions Copenhagen, who beat Kairat in their last UCL outing.

programme.title: UCL: Real Madrid v Manchester City
programme.desc: Manchester City make the daunting trip to Estadio Bernabeu to face 15-time UCL winners Real Madrid. City have failed to win any of their last four meetings with Los Blancos.

programme.title: UCL: Bayer Leverkusen v Newcastle
programme.desc: Bayer Leverkusen look to follow up on their incredible win at the Etihad as they face a Newcastle United side who will be desperate to bounce back from defeat in Marseille.

programme.title: UCL: Club Brugge v Arsenal
programme.desc: Arsenal aim to maintain the only perfect record remaining in the league phase as they go head-to-head with Ivan Leko's Club Brugge at Jan Breydel Stadium.

programme.title: UCL: Athletic Club v PSG
programme.desc: Ernesto Valverde's Athletic Club look for an upset as they host reigning UCL champions Paris Saint-Germain at San Mames.

programme.title: UCL: Benfica v Napoli
programme.desc: Benfica look to build on their first league phase win as they host Italian champions Napoli. Who will win in the battle between fierce rivals Jose Mourinho and Antonio Conte?

programme.title: UCL: Juventus v Pafos
programme.desc: Luciano Spalletti's Juventus face-off against Cypriot champions Pafos at Allianz Stadium. Can Juve record back-to-back UCL wins, or will the visitors cause a big upset?

programme.title: UCL: Dortmund v Bodo/Glimt
programme.desc: Borussia Dortmund look to add another win to their impressive league phase campaign as they host winless Bodo/Glimt at Signal Iduna Park.

programme.title: ESPN DOC
programme.desc: Op 25 november 2025 is het precies vijf jaar geleden dat Diego Armando Maradona overleed. De Argentijn loodste zijn land in 1986 eigenhandig naar de wereldtitel en nam eind jaren '80 het toen nog kleine Napoli bij de hand op weg naar twee Italiaanse landstitels. In 'Op zoek naar Maradona' ontmoet AD-journalist Sjoerd Mossou - schrijver van het gelijknamige boek - verschillende mensen op wie Maradona grote indruk maakte.

programme.title: Tien jaar Terug
programme.desc: In Tien jaar Terug duiken we in het Eredivisieverleden. In het seizoen 2015-2016 gaat PSV onder leiding van Phillip Cocu proberen de landstitel te prolongeren. Bij concurrent Ajax keert clubicoon John Heitinga terug en wordt de portemonnee getrokken voor Amin Younes, Nemanja Gudelj en Arek Milik. Feyenoord versterkt de aanval met Colin Kazim-Richards, Eljero Elia en Michiel Kramer.

programme.desc: Mario Been blies onlangs zestig kaarsjes uit. programme.title: ESPN DOC
programme.desc: Na een topseizoen bij PSV leek Sergiño Dest klaar voor een stap terug naar de absolute top, tot een zware knieblessure zijn dromen tijdelijk stilzette. In deze documentaire deelt hij hoe hij zijn zwaarste jaar tot nu toe beleeft. Ondertussen probeert PSV zijn afwezigheid op te vangen, terwijl Dest alles op alles zet om sterker terug te keren.

programme.title: ESPN DOC
programme.desc: Op 25 november 2025 is het precies vijf jaar geleden dat Diego Armando Maradona overleed. De Argentijn loodste zijn land in 1986 eigenhandig naar de wereldtitel en nam eind jaren '80 het toen nog kleine Napoli bij de hand op weg naar twee Italiaanse landstitels. In 'Op zoek naar Maradona' ontmoet AD-journalist Sjoerd Mossou - schrijver van het gelijknamige boek - verschillende mensen op wie Maradona grote indruk maakte.

programme.desc: In Tien jaar Terug duiken we in het Eredivisieverleden. In het seizoen 2015-2016 gaat PSV onder leiding van Phillip Cocu proberen de landstitel te prolongeren. Bij concurrent Ajax keert clubicoon John Heitinga terug en wordt de portemonnee getrokken voor Amin Younes, Nemanja Gudelj en Arek Milik. Feyenoord versterkt de aanval met Colin Kazim-Richards, Eljero Elia en Michiel Kramer.

programme.title: ESPN DOC
programme.desc: Op 25 november 2025 is het precies vijf jaar geleden dat Diego Armando Maradona overleed. De Argentijn loodste zijn land in 1986 eigenhandig naar de wereldtitel en nam eind jaren '80 het toen nog kleine Napoli bij de hand op weg naar twee Italiaanse landstitels. In 'Op zoek naar Maradona' ontmoet AD-journalist Sjoerd Mossou - schrijver van het gelijknamige boek - verschillende mensen op wie Maradona grote indruk maakte.

programme.desc: Leo Turrini ospita Paolo Barilla e Massimo Bottura per una chiacchierata ricca di aneddoti che spazia dalla F1 al valore della tavola e della nutrizione.

programme.title: GP Messico: Gara

programme.title: GP Qatar: Sprint

programme.title: GP Qatar: Gara

programme.title: Gara: GP Las Vegas

programme.desc: European Tour Golf from Leopark Creek in South Africa at the Alfred Dunhill Championship. Charl Schwartzel led by three shots going into the final round.

programme.desc: A chance to relive the 1999 US Open at the Pinehurst in North Carolina, which featured an unforgettable conclusion on the final day.

programme.desc: Professional golfers give advice on how to improve your game across all aspects, from the tee to the green. Here, former European Tour star Colin Montgomerie offers tips on the full swing.

programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the PGA Tour's Butterfield Bermuda Championship, held at the Port Royal Golf Course.

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from RSM Classic, a PGA Tour event held at Sea Island Golf Club. Maverick McNealy collected his first tour win here in his 142nd start a year.

programme.title: Players Championship Film 2025
programme.desc: The official film of the 2025 Players Championship at TPC Sawgrass in Ponte Vedra Beach. It would take a play-off between JJ Spaun and Rory McIlroy to decide the fate of the 51st edition.

programme.desc: The second round of the Alfred Dunhill Championship, a DP World Tour event held at Royal Johannesburg Club in South Africa.

programme.desc: Firmly established on the Legends Tour calendar, a look at the MCB Mauritius Legends - held at Constance Belle Mare Plage.

programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the Andalucia Costa Del Sol Open de Espana, the climactic event of the Ladies European Tour season taking place at Real Guadalhorce Club de Golf.

programme.title: DP World Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: The second round of the Alfred Dunhill Championship, a DP World Tour event held at Royal Johannesburg Club in South Africa. (12.12)

programme.title: Live PGA Tour Golf
programme.desc: The opening day of the Grant Thornton Invitational - the final PGA Tour event of the year - taking place at Tiburón Golf Club in Naples, Florida.

programme.title: DP World Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: The second round of the Alfred Dunhill Championship, a DP World Tour event held at Royal Johannesburg Club in South Africa. (12.12)

programme.title: PGA Tour Playoff Official Film '25
programme.desc: The official film of the 2025 FedEx Cup Playoffs, marking a memorable milestone in the career of England's Tommy Fleetwood - who captured his first PGA Tour victory.

programme.title: Ryder Cup Official Film
programme.desc: The official film of the 2025 Ryder Cup, as Team Europe claimed a first away victory since 2012 - defeating Keegan Bradley's Team USA in New York at Bethpage Black.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: A US Open finalist one month prior, Caroline Wozniacki's 2014 WTA Finals campaign got underway against then world number two Maria Sharapova in Singapore.

programme.title: Best of the US Open 2025
programme.desc: The United States' Taylor Fritz, a runner-up in Flushing the year before and the last American standing, met the 24-time Grand Slam champion Novak Djokovic in the quarter-finals.

programme.title: Best of the US Open 2025
programme.desc: Home favourite Frances Tiafoe, one of 2024's semi-finalists, entered the third round of the New York Slam to compete with German qualifier Jan-Lennard Struff on Grandstand.

programme.title: WTA Cincinnati 2025 Review
programme.desc: A review of the women's singles at the Cincinnati Open, a WTA Tour 1000 hard-court event.

programme.title: WTA Beijing 2025 Review
programme.desc: A review of the 2025 China Open - a WTA 1000 event held in Beijing.

programme.title: ATP Shanghai 2025 Revie
programme.desc: A review of the 2025 Rolex Shanghai Masters on the ATP Tour.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: In a five-hour, five-set Rome Open epic, an 18-year-old Rafael Nadal lit up the Foro Italico in his back-and-forth contest with Argentina's Guillermo Coria.

programme.title: WTA Final: Linz
programme.desc: Dayana Yastremska ends a near three-year wait to compete for a WTA title, as the Ukrainian faces the number four seed Ekaterina Alexandrova in the Upper Austria Ladies Linz final. (02.02)

programme.title: WTA Final: Indian Wells
programme.desc: Mirra Andreeva meets top seed Aryna Sabalenka in the Indian Wells final. Sabalenka avenged her Australian Open defeat to Keys in the semis, while Andreeva dethroned Swiatek. (16.03)

programme.title: WTA Final: Rome
programme.desc: A women's singles champion is crowned at the Italian Open, as home favourite and world number five Jasmine Paolini faces the American Coco Gauff. (17.05)

programme.title: WTA Final: Adelaide
programme.desc: In an all-American final at the Adelaide International, Jessica Pegula and Madison Keys contest the third instalment of their rivalry, with the head-to-head record at one apiece. (11.01)

programme.title: WTA Final: Charleston
programme.desc: Jessica Pegula enters her first Charleston Open final in her eighth appearance at the WTA 500 event, as the top seed faces 2020 Australian Open champion Sofia Kenin. (06.04)

programme.title: WTA Final: Bad Homburg
programme.desc: Contesting her first final in more than a year, and a first on grass, Iga Swiatek meets top seed Jessica Pegula for the Bad Homburg title. Swiatek leads the head-to-head record. (28.06)

programme.title: WTA Final: Ningbo
programme.desc: Out to strengthen her bid to reach the WTA Finals, Elena Rybakina targets WTA 500 glory in the Ningbo final as the world number nine meets fellow top-10 star Ekaterina Alexandrova. (19.10)

programme.title: WTA Finals
programme.desc: Aryna Sabalenka and Elena Rybakina - both undefeated in Riyadh - bid to become a first-time WTA Finals champion. This is the 14th meeting between the two, with Sabalenka 8-5 ahead. (08.11)

programme.title: WTA Final: Doha
